item.title: 英特尔将为中国推出两款人工智能芯片，功能有所减弱
item.description: 为了遵守美国的出口管制和制裁，英特尔将面向中国市场发布两款功能有所减弱的人工智能芯片。【原文：Intel will release two AI chips with reduced capabilities for the Chinese market, in order to comply with U.S. export controls and sanctions.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表戴志康表示正在 "认真研究 "应对中国的工具
item.description: 美国贸易代表凯瑟琳-戴（Katherine Tai）将于周二告诉立法者，拜登政府正在 "认真审视 "美国的贸易保护工具，以应对中国经贸政策带来的威胁，包括审查特朗普时代对中国进口商品征收的关税。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai will tell lawmakers on Tuesday that the Biden administration is "taking a serious look" at U.S. trade defense tools to deal with threats posed by China's trade and economic policies, including a review of Trump-era tariffs on Chinese imports.】

item.title: 特斯拉全球裁员包括主要市场美国和中国
item.description: 五位知情人士透露，特斯拉的全球裁员包括在美国和中国这两个汽车制造商最大的市场裁员，涉及销售、技术和工程等领域。【原文：Tesla's global job cuts include reducing staff in the U.S. and China, the automakers' two biggest markets, across sales, tech, and engineering, five sources briefed on the matter said.】

item.title: 中国囤积美元与人民币贬值恶性循环
item.description: 中国企业正在囤积美元，因为他们预计本国货币将走软，而这反过来又加剧了人民币的下滑，而股市的动荡和世界第二大经济体的增长乏力一直在推动着人民币的下滑。【原文：Chinese businesses are hoarding dollars because they expect their own currency to weaken, and that in turn is exacerbating a slide in the yuan that has been driven by wobbly stock markets and feeble growth in the world's second largest economy.】

item.title: 本田将于 2027 年在中国推出新一代电动汽车
item.description: 日本本田汽车公司周二表示，该公司计划到2027年在中国推出六款以Ye为品牌的下一代电动汽车（EV）车型。【原文：Japan's Honda Motor plans to launch six next-generation electric vehicle (EV) models branded Ye in China by 2027, the automaker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚洲对冲基金第一季度受益于日本经济反弹和中国经济复苏
item.description: 聚焦亚洲的对冲基金在 2024 年第一季度表现强劲，从日本股市的长期反弹、中国股市的初步好转以及人工智能（AI）股票的繁荣中获利。【原文：Asia-focused hedge funds started 2024 with a strong first quarter, cashing in on a prolonged rally in Japanese stocks, a tentative turnaround in Chinese equities, and a boom in artificial intelligence (AI) stocks.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特斯拉全球裁员将冲击中国销售团队
item.description: 两位知情人士称，特斯拉在全球范围内的裁员正冲击中国这个仅次于美国的最大市场，包括销售在内的团队员工都将受到影响。【原文：Tesla's global job cuts are hitting China, the automaker's biggest market after the United States, affecting staff in teams including sales, two sources briefed on the matter said.】

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛调查显示，资产经理两年多来最看好后市
item.description: 美国银行 4 月份的月度基金经理调查显示，投资者增加了股票和大宗商品的配置，抛售了债券。【原文：Investors have increased their allocations to stocks and commodities and dumped bonds, Bank of America's monthly fund manager survey for April showed, which they said was the most bullish such survey since January 2022.】

item.title: Amundi 以美国业务换取 Victory 26% 的股份
item.description: 欧洲最大的资产管理公司 Amundi 周二表示，已同意将其美国业务出售给 Victory Capital，以换取该公司 26% 的股份。【原文：Amundi , Europe's largest asset manager, said on Tuesday it had agreed to sell its U.S. business to Victory Capital in exchange for a 26% stake in the U.S. company.】

item.title: 英国折扣店 B&M 预计全年利润将达到指导目标的上限
item.description: 英国折扣连锁店 B&M 周二预计，全年利润将达到其指导目标的上限，因为该公司报告期内收入增长了 10.1%，部分原因是新店开张。【原文：British discount chain B&M on Tuesday forecast full year profit at the top end of its guidance as it reported a 10.1% rise in revenue for the period that was partly driven by new store openings.】

item.title: 中国城市郑州通知国有企业购买二手房以减少新房库存
item.description: 中国中部城市郑州要求居民将二手房出售给当地一家国有企业，转而购买新房，以减少新房库存，促进当地房地产行业的发展。【原文：China's central city of Zhengzhou has asked residents to sell their second-hand homes to a local state-owned company and buy new ones instead, in a bid to reduce new-home inventories and boost the local property sector.】

item.title: 地穴：保持减半
item.description: 今年比特币的大涨会不会才刚刚开始？【原文：Could bitcoin's bumper rally just be getting started this year?】

item.title: 欧洲银行希望欧盟将其指定为 "战略 "部门
item.description: 据周二发表的一份报告称，欧洲银行呼吁欧盟将其指定为一个极其重要的 "战略 "部门，并警告说它们的竞争力和集团的未来岌岌可危。【原文：European Banks are calling on the European Union to designate them a critically important "strategic" sector, warning that their competitiveness and the bloc's future are at stake, according to a report published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 瑞士部长表示，瑞银新增 150-250 亿美元的资本需求是现实的
item.description: 据周二援引瑞士财政部长的话说，根据政府旨在使银行业更加稳健的建议，瑞士银行瑞银集团（UBS）将需要再投入 150 亿至 250 亿美元资本金的估计是正确的。【原文：Estimates that Swiss bank UBS will require another $15 billion to $25 billion in capital under government proposals aimed at making the banking sector more robust are about right, Switzerland's finance minister was quoted as saying on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，微软将向阿联酋人工智能公司 G42 投资 15 亿美元
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周二报道，微软计划向阿拉伯联合酋长国的一家人工智能公司 G42 投资 15 亿美元。【原文：Microsoft plans to invest $1.5 billion in G42, an artificial intelligence firm in the United Arab Emirates, the New York Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场情绪持续低迷
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 中国新房价格以 2015 年以来最快速度下降
item.description: 由于大型房地产开发商的债务问题继续拖累需求和经济前景，3 月份中国新房价格创下八年多来最快降幅。【原文：New home prices in China fell at their fastest pace in more than eight years in March as the debt woes of major property developers continued to drag on demand and the economic outlook.】

item.title: 法官驳回针对 Meta 公司扎克伯格社交媒体伤害的部分诉讼请求
item.description: Meta Platforms 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）周一赢得了对指控他向公众隐瞒 Facebook 和 Instagram 对儿童有害的十几起诉讼中部分索赔的驳回。【原文：Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg on Monday won the dismissal of some claims in a dozen lawsuits accusing him of concealing from the public that Facebook and Instagram were harmful to children.】

item.title: 百度称人工智能聊天机器人 "厄尼机器人 "已积累 2 亿用户
item.description: 中国百度周二表示，其人工智能聊天机器人 "二维机器人 "已获得超过2亿用户，它正努力在日益激烈的竞争中保持中国最受欢迎的类似于ChatGPT的聊天机器人的地位。【原文：China's Baidu said on Tuesday its artificial intelligence chatbot “Ernie Bot” has garnered more than 200 million users as it seeks to remain China’s most popular ChatGPT-like chatbot amid increasingly fierce competition.】

item.title: 在政策支持下，中国第一季度 GDP 增长快于预期
item.description: 周二的数据显示，中国第一季度经济增长速度超过预期，这为试图在房地产行业长期疲软和地方政府债务不断增加的情况下支撑经济增长的官员们提供了一些宽慰。【原文：China's economy grew faster-than-expected in the first quarter, data showed on Tuesday, offering some relief to officials as they try to shore up growth in the face of protracted weakness in the property sector and mounting local government debt.】

item.title: 中国第一季度国内生产总值同比增长 5.3%，远高于预期
item.description: 周二的官方数据显示，中国第一季度经济同比增长5.3%，大大超出分析师的预期，这对决策者来说是一个值得欢迎的迹象，因为他们正努力在长期的房地产危机中支撑需求和信心。【原文：China's economy grew 5.3% in the first quarter year-on-year, official data showed on Tuesday, comfortably beating analysts' expectations, a welcome sign for policymakers as they try to shore up demand and confidence in the face of a protracted property crisis.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因美联储重新考虑降息而下滑；中国 GDP 受关注
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市下跌，美元攀升至五个多月高点，原因是美国3月份零售销售强于预期，进一步强化了美联储今年不太可能急于降息的预期。【原文：Asian stocks fell and the dollar climbed to more than five-month highs on Tuesday as stronger-than-expected U.S. retail sales for March further reinforced expectations that the Federal Reserve is unlikely to be in a rush to cut interest rates this year.】

item.title: 零售销售火爆后美元走强，日元萎靡不振；中国数据值得期待
item.description: 周二，美元兑几种同类货币的汇率刚刚触及 11 月初以来的最高点，引发了对干预的担忧，因为在美国零售销售好于预期之后，日元在 1990 年以来的最低点徘徊。【原文：The dollar stood just off its highest since early November against a handful of peer currencies on Tuesday, raising intervention worries as the yen languished at its lowest level since 1990 following hotter-than-expected U.S. retail sales.】

item.title: 戴利说，美国联邦储备委员会不应在不需要时采取紧急行动
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周一表示，美国经济和劳动力市场强劲，通胀率仍高于美联储2%的目标，因此没有降息的紧迫性。 "戴利在斯坦福大学经济政策研究所（Stanford Institute for Economic Policy Research）表示："最糟糕的事情就是在不需要紧急的时候采取紧急行动。戴利是制定美国货币政策的 19 位美国央行行长之一。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly said on Monday there is no urgency to cut U.S. interest rates, with the economy and labor market strong, and inflation still above the Fed's 2% target. "The worst thing to do is act urgently when urgency is not required," Daly said at the Stanford Institute for Economic Policy Research. Daly is one of 19 U.S. central bankers who set U.S. monet】

item.title: 人工智能芯片需求强劲，台积电第一季度利润预计增长 5
item.description: 台湾中芯国际集成电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.，简称 "台积电"）是人工智能应用领域先进芯片的主要生产商，由于需求强劲，预计本周四公布的第一季度利润将增长 5%。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co , , the dominant producer of advanced chips used in artificial intelligence applications, is expected to report a 5% rise in first-quarter profit on Thursday thanks to strong demand.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟探索公司关闭新闻编辑室后，新西兰 Stuff 集团将制作新闻节目
item.description: 新西兰媒体网站 Stuff Group 周二表示，它已与华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）签署协议，为华纳兄弟探索公司的新西兰电视频道提供每天下午 6 点的新闻节目。【原文：New Zealand media site Stuff Group said on Tuesday it had signed an agreement with Warner Bros Discovery to provide Warner Bros Discovery's New Zealand television channel with a 6 p.m. daily news programme.】

item.title: 日本财务大臣称正密切关注外汇走势
item.description: 日本财务大臣铃木俊一周二表示，他正在密切关注货币走势，并将在美元飙升至 34 年新高后做出 "必要的全面回应"。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki said on Tuesday he was closely watching currency moves and will provide a "thorough response as needed" after the dollar surged to a fresh 34-year high.】

item.title: 以色列权衡应对伊朗袭击的措施，油价上涨
item.description: 以色列军方负责人表示，以色列将对伊朗周末发动的导弹和无人机袭击做出回应，而盟国则呼吁伊朗保持克制，在中东紧张局势加剧的背景下，周二油价上涨。【原文：Oil prices rose on Tuesday amid heightened tensions in the Middle East after Israel's military chief said his country would respond to Iran's weekend missile and drone attack amid calls for restraint by allies.】

item.title: Regeneron 将为美国司法部关于药物定价操纵的指控进行辩护
item.description: 再生元制药公司（Regeneron Pharmaceuticals）周一表示，美国司法部对该公司虚报黄斑变性药物 Eylea 平均销售价格的指控 "毫无根据"，该公司计划在法庭上为此案辩护。【原文：Regeneron Pharmaceuticals said on Monday the U.S. Justice Department's complaint against the company misreporting the average sales price for its macular degeneration drug Eylea is "meritless" and it plans to defend this case in court.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官戴蒙出售约 3,300 万美元股票，完成出售计划
item.description: 周一的一份监管文件显示，摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）已出售了约 3300 万美元的银行股份，完成了此前披露的出售 100 万股的计划。【原文：JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon has sold about $33 million of his shares in the bank, a regulatory filing showed on Monday, completing a previously disclosed plan to sell 1 million shares.】
